statement.title: Content
Standard Input
statement.content: The first line of input contains the number of data sets, $N (1 \leq N \leq 50)$. For each data set, the input contains the raw data emitted by the zombie sensor's serial port (see above for details) followed by a line containing only the string `END OF CASE`. Since data is emitted by the zombie sensor's serial port once per second, the first line of input is read after $1$ second, the $2$nd line after $2$ seconds, and so on.

statement.title: Standard Output
statement.content: For each complete log entry, you should output a line containing `timestamp: log_entry`, where timestamp is the number of seconds elapsed between the start of the data set and the time at which the entry was completely parsed.
